Title: WPF Setup Wizard
Description: A WPF implementation of a setup wizard for chaining multiple msi files implemented using the MVVM design pattern.
HomeWiki:
WPF Setup

WPF Setup is a MSI setup bootstrapper capable of chaining multiple MSI files into a single setup wizard using the MVVM design pattern. It is a work in progress, you can follow development on my blog: http://blog.douglasmendizabal.com/?p=19
